definitions.definition: Any member of a race of beings from (especially Scandinavian and other Germanic ) folklore , usually depicted as having some sort of supernatural powers and being skilled in crafting and metalworking , often as short with long beards, and sometimes as clashing with elves .
A person of short stature , often one whose limbs are disproportionately small in relation to the body as compared with typical adults, usually as the result of a genetic condition .
An animal , plant or other thing much smaller than the usual of its sort.

main_definition: ( mythology ) Any member of a race of beings from (especially Scandinavian and other Germanic ) folklore , usually depicted as having some sort of supernatural powers and being skilled in crafting and metalworking , often as short with long beards, and sometimes as clashing with elves .
secondary_definitions: ( now sometimes offensive ) A person of short stature , often one whose limbs are disproportionately small in relation to the body as compared with typical adults, usually as the result of a genetic condition .
An animal , plant or other thing much smaller than the usual of its sort.
